query.stmt: select t.title,spc.name type,t.content,t.view_times,spu.name user_name, to_char(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') create_time from ${code_table} t left join sys_pa_code spc on spc.code_table=[code_table] and spc.code_field='TYPE' and t.type=spc.code_num left join sys_p_user spu on t.create_user=spu.id where t.id=[id]
